channel.title: English on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers
channel.description: Recent content in English on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers

item.title: Nylas Partners with Seasalt.ai to Help Asia Pacific and Japanese Organizations Unlock Conversational AI and Developer Productivity
item.description: PALO ALTO – March 27, 2024 – Nylas, the state-of-the-art communications platform giving developers universal access to email, calendar, and contacts providers through a single API integration, today announced a strategic partnership with Seasalt.

item.title: Seasalt.ai Becomes a Reseller of Twilio Flex
item.description: SEATTLE – Seasalt.ai signed an agreement with Twilio to resell Twilio Flex, enabling them to directly sell Twilio Flex to end customers in China, Hong Kong and Taiwan.

item.title: No Jitter Interviews Seasalt.ai CEO and Co-Founder Xuchen Yao
item.description: No Jitter recently asked Seasalt.ai CEO and Co-Founder Xuchen Yao to talk about Seasalt.

item.title: Twilio and Seasalt.ai Expand Partnership in Asia Pacific & Japan to Build Multi-Country Cloud Contact Centers
item.description: Twilio and Seasalt.ai announce the expansion of their partnership to Asia Pacific and Japan.
